page.title: 07Holidaymakers in Shanklin
page.content: We interviewed some tourists on{Appley {Beach},once on a sunny day and once on a rainy day.On the sunny day 10 out of 14 people liked Shanklin.Two people came from{Wolverhampton},one from {Birmingham},and a group of{German students were here to improve their English. Three people stayed at{Shanklin hotels and two at{Thorness Bay holiday camp. None of their children took part in the Domesday Project.On a rainy day 9 out of 11 liked Shanklin.One came from {Nottingham},one from{Manchester},two from{Potter's Bar,Hertfordshire}and two from{Sutton Coldfield}.Most of the people had been here several times. The things that the holiday makers liked about{Shanklin was the sunny {weather,climbing hills,the sea and {cliff walks.
